name: Temple Spell
description:
Temple spell is an typing arena game, you need to type the word correctly to maximize your damage.

Try to survive against boss and monster, and do the best wave score !!

Game type are Beath Them All and Typing.

Movement

  • ZQSD or WASD

Basic

  • Pickup spell with E or drop it with A or Q

Attack

  • Launch your spell with left click

Spell

  • Use 1 or 2 to change your spell, use an empty slot to pick a spell on the ground or change it with the current spell

Features

 5 different monster

  • Anaconda
  • Zombie
  • Spider
  • Mummy
  • Scaraba

3 boss

  • Ancient Tree
  • Anubis
  • Murderer

6 spell

  • Ice Bullet
  • Fire Ball
  • Electrical thunder
  • Heal
  • Armor
  • Seismic
